metadata.name: Execute Invoke-command on Remote Host
metadata.comment: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to interact with remote systems using Windows Remote Management (WinRM). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-command ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -computername ')))

output.summary: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to interact with remote systems using Windows Remote Management (WinRM). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
